announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch 0.18 - The Garden
announcements.description: Today we are excited to release a new SkyBlock farming island called The Garden! The Garden is an extension of your Private Island, unlocked after reaching SkyBlock Level 5, where you can create and edit your own personal farms.

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch March 24 - Various Grammatical Fixes
announcements.description: We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock! This update focuses on correcting some grammar mistakes in different areas in the game
